attributes.action: force all lorries to be fitted with anti-spray mudflaps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Driving on motorways is downright dangerous in wet weather due to many lorries creating excessive spray. If all lorries had to be fitted with anti-spray mudflaps the position would become much safer. The cost of these compared to the price of a new lorry is negligible, yet it could save lives.
